titlestmt.titleproper: Arts of China Lantern Slide Collection
Arts of China Lantern Slide Collection
titlestmt.author: Compiled by Christina Corrigan

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Saturday December 8, 2018 at 00:17

did.unittitle: Arts of China Lantern Slide Collection
did.abstract: Collection consists of black and white glass lantern slides of Chinese arts of all periods, pre-historic to the mid-20th century. Includes architecture, painting, sculpture, calligraphy, ceramics, ivory, jade, lacquer, metalwork, textiles, rugs, and tapestry.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: The materials are open for research.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Copyright has not been transferred to Yale University. Further use of this material may be subject to the copyright laws of the United States (Title 17, United States Code) or to site license or other rights management terms or conditions.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Arts of China Lantern Slide Collection

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Collection consists of black and white glass lantern slides of Chinese arts of all periods, pre-historic to the mid-20th century. Includes architecture, painting, sculpture, calligraphy, ceramics, ivory, jade, lacquer, metalwork, textiles, rugs, and tapestry.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Arranged alphabetically by medium. Further sub-divided by location or chronological period, and if known, by individual artist name.

did.unittitle: Landscape in Style of Ni Tsan
Tomb of Ho Ch'in Ping, Shensi
Hsiang T'ang Shan Caves, Hopei and Honan

p.emph: 164 painting lantern slides reviewed by Richard Bamhart. Set aside as duplicates.
